mapper.select: SELECT f.f_code, cs.cates_name, f.f_content, f.f_sum, f.f_num, f.f_date, f.f_redate, f.f_ck, f.cates_code FROM flea f, cate_sub cs, cate_mid cm, cate_main c where f.cates_code = cs.cates_code and cs.catemm_code = cm.catemm_code and cm.catem_code = c.catem_code and f.s_id = #{s_id} ORDER BY f_date DESC

SELECT f.s_id, f.f_code, f.f_date, f.f_redate, f.f_sum, f.f_pname, f.f_spname, f.f_content, f.f_ck, f.f_num, f.s_id, cs.cates_code, cs.cates_name, cm.catemm_code, cm.catemm_name, c.catem_code, c.catem_name FROM flea f JOIN cate_sub cs ON f.cates_code = cs.cates_code JOIN cate_mid cm ON cs.catemm_code = cm.catemm_code JOIN cate_main c ON cm.catem_code = c.catem_code WHERE f.f_code = #{f_code} ORDER BY f_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE flea SET f_redate = sysdate, cates_code = #{cates_code}, f_sum = #{f_sum}, f_content = #{f_content}, f_num = #{f_num} WHERE f_code = #{f_code}
